name: Spy of Deimos
description:
Deimos is the natural satellite of Pluto which is far away from the earth and now becoming the headquarter of Sorova, the illegal company which has been trying to build a forbidden weapon called Orbeam. You must destroy their facility from the inside and manipulate the robots they built.Features
  • Select your personal equipment: teleporter, laser shotgun, hyper beam, invisible ray, and hydrogen trap.
  • 50 levels of the building to solve. Every 10 levels you will face powerful bosses.
  • 10 types of enemy robots with their unique artificial intelligence.
  • 5 Powerful Bosses. They can learn your movement and change their moves based on your combat behavior.
  • You can improve and manipulate the dropped weapon from the enemies.
